definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The first black woman to be recognised as a sculptor.
sentences.chinese: 被承认的第一个黑人女性雕刻家。

sentences.english: He can make a good sculptor.
sentences.chinese: 他能成为一名优秀的雕刻家。

sentences.english: A chisel and a hammer are indispensable tools for a sculptor.
sentences.chinese: 对一个雕刻家来说，錾子和铁锤是不可缺少的工具。

sentences.english: The occupation choices that they were allowed were:bank teller, sculptress, or something else.
sentences.chinese: 可以选择的职业有，银行出纳，雕刻家，其他。

sentences.english: The crafter actually can carve the human faces with different expressions on banana.
sentences.chinese: 雕刻家在香蕉上雕塑出了不同的表情。

sentences.english: Water is a skillful carver. "Constant dripping wears away stone" is his masterpiece.
sentences.chinese: 水是技艺高超的雕刻家，滴水穿石是他的杰作。

sentences.english: Their sculptors carved countless figures of her.
sentences.chinese: 他们的雕刻家塑造了无数个她的形象。

sentences.english: Many of the works of the sculptor were on display this time.
sentences.chinese: 这次展出了这位雕刻家的许多作品。

sentences.english: No one could match the skill of the unknown carver.
sentences.chinese: 没有哪个人的技艺能比得上那位不出名的雕刻家。

sentences.english: Zhang Yaxi is a contemporary chinese sculptor.
sentences.chinese: 张亚西是中国的当代雕刻家。

sentences.english: Russian sculptor built a monument in front of Dynamo Stadium in Kiev to memorize them.
sentences.chinese: 苏联雕刻家在狄纳莫体育馆前为他们立了一座纪念碑。

sentences.english: The sculptor worked the clay into the shape of a woman.
sentences.chinese: 雕刻家将泥土捏成壹个妇女的形状。

definition: Michelangelo Buonarroti (1475-1564), Renaissance painter and sculptor
Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter
